name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spider-Man: Web-Slinging Adventure in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swing into action with Spider-Man in this dynamic theme, featuring thrilling visuals and convenient shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Swing into action with Spider-Man’s vibrant visuals, bringing the city to life.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by Spider-Man's agility and charm.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on top of time with the clock and date at a glance.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with ease.
🎮 Play Games: Access thrilling Spider-Man-themed games directly from your shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
🚀 More Extension: Add features that enhance your browsing experience with Spider-Man’s web-slinging energy.
